# The `VPReductionEVLRecipe` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A recipe to represent inloop reduction operations with vector-predication intrinsics, performing a reduction on a vector operand with the explicit vector length (EVL) into a scalar value, and adding the result to a chain. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A recipe to represent inloop reduction operations with vector-predication intrinsics, performing a reduction on a vector operand with the explicit vector length (EVL) into a scalar value, and adding the result to a chain.

The Operands are &#123;ChainOp, VecOp, EVL, &#91;Condition&#93;&#125;.

Definition at line 2739 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
